(inner) developmentFlags :Object Member

Summary:

Various flags to call when initiating a command-line gulp call.

Source:
gulpfile.js, line 98
Type:
Object
Properties
Name Type Description
dev Object/String

Pass this flag to use unminified files & sourcemaps.
bs Object/String

Pass this flag to initiate an instance of BrowserSync.
proxy Object/String

Pass this flag to use the currently defined localhost variable.
flags Variable

minimist(process.argv.slice(2), knownFlags);

(inner) localhost :Variable Member

Summary:

Variable for --proxy flag.

Source:
gulpfile.js, line 30
Type:
Variable
Properties
Name Type Description
localhost String

URL endpoint

Define the localhost proxy to use when activating the --proxy flag, this will point your BrowserSync initiation to the desired URL instead of opening up a new tab window using localhost:3000.

Methods

(inner) defaultTask() Method

Summary:

Runs all gulp functions in one call.

Source:
gulpfile.js, line 125

Running the default CLI command, gulp, produces all the primary tasks: docs, sass, images, watch.

 gulp
